2) Closed the first TITLE element before the descriptive text and moved that text into a new SUBTITLE element to avoid mixed, unstructured content in TITLE.
3) Introduced SUBTITLE in the second BIBL as well, again separating the main title from the extended description.
4) Normalized the FORMAT value "8v�c4." to the more standard "8vo." while keeping it within the existing FORMAT tag.
